alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baldwin, northwestern Wilkinson, northern Bibb, northwestern Twiggs, southeastern Monroe and southern Jones Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Griswoldville, or 7 miles northeast of Macon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Macon, Gray, Gordon, Ivey, Payne, Payne City, Postell, James, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Fitzpatrick, Greenberry Crossroads, Clinton, Ripley, Cross Keys, Wesleyan, Dry Branch, Myricks Mill, Arkwright and Franklinton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Jones; Monroe; Twiggs; Wilkinson
